title: [Bug]: Meetings freeze after 20 minutes
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

After around 20 minutes, the meetings will freeze. Audio stops working and the video feeds stop. 

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.5

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Join or host a meeting.
2. Turn on video feed.
3. Leave the meeting up for about 20 minutes.

The meeting will freeze and I need to leave and rejoin the existing meeting.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
The meeting should not freeze.
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

I have reproduced under both Wayland and Xorg. I have no permissions overridden in the Flatpak. The application functions well otherwise and has until very recently. This has only begun happening since the last update.

I am happy to help provide any other technical details.
